item.title: A Quick Intro
item.description: Hello, and welcome. My name is Benson (Ben for short, hard to get coffee otherwise). This is a site where I talk about stuff that I have interest in, which includes but isn’t limited to: Video Games & the Industry Disclaimer: I’m not of the industry, but I do read about it often. Consoles (of the video game variety) Computer Science Programming Computer Hardware

item.title: First Post
item.description: Migrating from Wordpress to Github pages via hugo. Feels pretty good thus far, and I wanted to dust off my old Github home page anyway. Introductory post coming soon, this is just a test. Ben
